DOC.brief_summary: project evaluate community school base program promote healthy relationship prevent violence ( physical , emotional sexual date violence ) among predominately African American middle school adolescent urban setting ( Baltimore , MD ) .
DOC.brief_title: An Arts-Based Initiative Prevention Violence Against Women Girls
DOC.detailed_description: This initiative include 4 major component : 1 ) A variety art base student activity relate violence prevention ( school theatre project , and/or school visual art project , web page design project . ( All student either directly participate activity least see ) , 2 ) Curricular component 7th grader , 3 ) Violence prevention early intervention student support/discussion group , 4 ) Faculty staff training subject . The evaluation quasi-experimental pre/post test comparison group design ( 2 school group ) , comparison school convert intervention school one year serve comparison school . We use group ( student teacher survey ) school wide ( climate school ) measure pre post intervention .
DOC.criteria: Students four middle school urban Baltimore , MD ( Dunbar , Lombard , Calverton Lemmel Middle Schools )
